Lliiras laughThis spell was originally named Chaavs laugh in the Book of Exalted Deeds. Since it is in the joy domain which is in Lliiras portfolio, it was renamed in the Players Guide to Faer√ªn. was an enchantment spell that bolstered the resolve of good creatures and demoralized evil ones.
After this spell was cast, the cleric released a boisterous and jovial laugh. Only those that that were in earshot, and those were not of neutral alignment, could be affected by the spell. The caster released a joyous, boisterous laugh that heightened the morale of good creatures and weakened that of evil creatures.
Good creatures within the radius of the spells target became less fearful, and more vigorous. Evil creatures within the spells area that lacked willpower lost morale and were more prone to fear.
This spell could be cast verbally with no somatic or material components required.
